title: Escaping the Chrome Sandbox Through DevTools
dot:
digraph VulnerabilityAnalysis{rankdir=TB;node[shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor="#e0f7fa"];introduction[label="Introduction
- CVE-2024-6778 & CVE-2024-5836
- Sandbox escape vulnerability in Chrome
- $20,000 reward from Google", fontsize=12]; webUIs[label="WebUIs & Chrome Sandbox
- Sandboxed code in Chromium
